name: Solar
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.Angelic Weapons: The solar's weapon attacks are magical. When the solar hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 6d8 radiant damage (included in the attack).
traits.Divine Awareness: The solar knows if it hears a lie.
traits.Magic Resistance: The solar has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

options.Teleport: The solar magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.
options.Searing Burst (Costs 2 Actions): The solar emits magical, divine energy. Each creature of its choice in a 10-foot radius must make a DC 23+1d14 + 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) fire damage plus 14 (4d6) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
options.Blinding Gaze (Costs 3 Actions): The solar targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see it, the target must succeed on a DC 15+1d14 + 8 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until magic such as the lesser restoration spell removes the blindness.
